loginText: This platform is for only Scorp Inc. members.
dontHaveAccount: Do you have a verification code?
signUpText: By signing up, you agree to our
sendResetPassText: We'll send you a link to reset your password
faqNo1Desc: Scorp Members is a sharing platform designed for Scorp Inc. employees.
faqNo2Title: How can i become a member?
faqNo2Desc: You can become a member with your confirmation code via the link sent to company employees.
faqNo3Title: I do not have any confirmation code, what will i do?
faqNo3Desc: Please, check our contact page and fill in the form. Verifcation code and link will send to your company mail.
